MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the CW5 postcode area of Nantwich, affecting properties in Station View, Whitlow Avenue and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 6:12PM. Our emergency response team are on site carrying out investigations and will work to get the power back on as quickly and as safely as possible. Once we receive information from them we will make every effort to let you know when the power will be restored. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 6:36PM on 28th February 2021.
